DOC.brief_title: Interventions HIV+ Mothers With Problem Drinking
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate efficacy 14-session behavioral intervention HIV-infected uninfected mother problem drinking . We target 118 mother adolescent child ( age 11-18 ) . The intervention base Social Action Theory ( Ewart , 1991 ) target alcohol drug problem , sexual risk behavior , parent . Mothers follow interviewed four interval 18 month . Because anticipate intervention effect adolescent behavior , youth also enrol interview three interval 12 month . Adolescents attend intervention session . We hypothesize mother 14-session intervention condition show improvement alcohol drug use , sexual risk behavior , parent comparison control condition , receive one session brief video intervention .
